summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for street improvements on Northeast Northgate Way from 1st Avenue Northeast to 250 feet east of 15th Avenue Northeast (Northeast Northgate Way UAB Project) authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and estimates; preliminary right-of-way activities; authorizing the hiring of consultants and awarding of contracts; and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial Development Fund therefor.
